modName: Daedric BOOST - Increases Daedric Weapons damage
summary:
Hello Everyone! I`ve released a new mod again! "Daedric BOOST".

This mod increases the damage for all Daedric Weapons by 30 - 40%! This mod makes the Daedric Weapons more powerful and realistic, but not too OP! Read the full Description to find out more!
descriptionHtml:
Always I thought the Daedric Weapons was not so strong in damage and strengh...
did you ever feel so? Yes Daedric Weapons are strong but for somebody not strong enough.

So I decided to make a mod that adds more Power and Strengh to the Daedric Weapons,
without making them too overpowered!!!
This mod enhances and increases the damage for all Daedric Weapons by 20 - 40%.
Hope you enjoy! More Boosts for all Weapons, like Iron and Steel will follow!!!
---------------
I WOULD BE HAPPY, IF SOMEBODY COULD SHOWCASE MY MOD IN A SHORT YOUTUBE VIDEO... I DON`T REALLY KNOW ANYTHING ABOUT SHOWCASING.... . A BIG THANK YOU, IF YOU COULD SHOWCASE MY MOD! :D


SORRY FOR MY BAD ENGLISH I`M GERMAN!!
NOTE: THE COMMENT SECTION IS USED TO ASK QUESTIONS ABOUT MY MOD AND NOT FOR BOTHERING ME WITH ABSOLUTELY STUPID QUESTIONS ABOUT MY ENGLISH!!! I WILL NOT CARE ABOUT WHAT YOU THINK ABOUT MY ENGLISH! I JUST TRY MY BEST TO WRITE IN ENGLISH!!!
author: happybuddergie

files.name: Daedric BOOST LATEST
